text: Luigi's Mansion 3 is a 2019 video game made by Nintendo. It is the third game in the Luigi's Mansion series. The game was released on the Nintendo Switch on October 31, 2019. The main setting of this game is a haunted hotel. The new gameplay feature in this game is the addition of Gooigi, a slimy version of Luigi, the main character and protagonist. Category:2019 video games Category:Nintendo Switch-only games Category:Luigi games Category:Video games about ghosts
title: Luigi's Mansion 3
